title: Koch Foods Recalls Breaded Poultry Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, July 18, 2019 Koch Foods, a Fairfield, Ohio establishment, is recalling approximately 743 pounds of fully cooked boneless chicken bites due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain soy, milk...
impacted_products: SCHWAN’S FULLY COOKED Crispy Chicken Breast Strips
